termsAndConditionsText1: The Smart Platform for Government Support is managed by the Sharjah Government Media Bureau. All terms and conditions stated on this page apply to all users of this platform.
acceptanceOfProvisionsText1: Please read the terms and conditions carefully, as the user confirms his/her commitment to the terms and conditions governing the use of the platform, and the Sharjah Government Media Bureau reserves the right to change the terms and conditions without prior notice.
acceptanceOfProvisionsText2: The ‘Sharjah Government Media Bureau’ logo is a registered trademark in the United Arab Emirates under copyright and intellectual property rights.
acceptanceOfProvisionsText3: Unless otherwise stated, the user must acknowledge and accept that all rights and platform materials, which include original works, computer programs, data, ideas and concepts produced and developed by the Sharjah Government Media Bureau website, are owned and licensed by the Sharjah Government Media Bureau and are protected by the laws of the United Arab Emirates.
noLiabilityText1: The responsible managers, employees, and all companies supervising the Government Support Platform of the Sharjah Government Media Bureau, its agents, suppliers, service providers, and licensors, shall not be held liable for any damage, loss, claim, or any direct, indirect, disciplinary, special, incidental, or any consequential damages of any kind including, but not limited to, loss of profits, loss of revenue, loss of savings, loss of data, replacement costs, or similar damages whether in contract, tort (including omission), strict liability or the like, arising from your use of any services offered on the Platform or any other claim relating in any way to your use of the service, including without limitation any error or omission in any content, any loss or damage of any kind arising from the use of the service or any content posted, transmitted or made available through the service even if it has been advised of its possibility.
noLiabilityText2: We are making every effort to ensure that the Government Support Platform is available and is operated easily. However, the Sharjah Government Media Bureau website does not bear any responsibility and will not be held responsible for the service being temporarily unavailable due to technical matters beyond its control or any damages resulting in this regard.
compensationText1: The user agrees to release the Sharjah Government Media Bureau website, its employees, branches, affiliates, partners, directors, agents, licensors and service providers from any claim including reasonable attorneys’ fees arising from a third party as a result of the user’s breach of these terms and conditions.
governingLawText1: The terms and conditions, or any separate agreements through which we provide services to you, are governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Using this platform is considered an agreement by you to those terms and conditions. In the event of any dispute arising as a result of accessing the site, jurisdiction will be exclusive to the courts of the Emirate of Sharjah.
waiverText1: By using this platform, you agree to consider that any exceptions or restrictions on liability specified in the waiver for the Government Support Platform are acceptable, and if the court decides that any of the aforementioned terms and conditions are invalid and unenforceable, this will not affect the rest of the terms and conditions mentioned in this document.
waiverText2: You (the user) expressly agree that your use or inability to use this platform is at your sole risk, and the services provided to you through the platform are considered “as is” and without any representation, warranties or conditions of any kind, whether express or implied.
noGuaranteesText1: Without prejudice to the generality of the following paragraph, the Sharjah Government Media Bureau does not guarantee that:
noGuaranteesPoint1: This platform will be available continuously, or at all due to technical considerations.
noGuaranteesPoint2: The information contained in the aforementioned Platform is complete, final and unchangeable as it relates to the conditions and nature of life in the Emirate of Sharjah.
noGuaranteesText2: In addition to the above, nothing contained on this Platform constitutes or is intended to constitute any type of advice.
contactUsText1: If you have any queries regarding the above terms and conditions, please contact us via email at: GCN@SGMB.ae
privacyPolicyText1: This policy describes how the Sharjah Government Media Bureau utilises, protects and uses information provided by users of this platform, (“User”). This privacy policy applies to the Sharjah Government Media Bureau website and all services provided through the website.
privacyPolicyText2: If you are asked to provide us with information when you use the Government Support Platform of the Sharjah Government Media Bureau, this information will be used only in the ways specified in the privacy policy. The privacy policy of the aforementioned website may be updated from time to time and the last time it was updated was on 9/18/2017.
privacyPolicyText3: The term “we” mentioned in the privacy policy refers to the Sharjah Government Media Bureau.
dataCollectionText1: We may collect and use certain data about individuals in various ways, including, but not limited to, when users visit the Government Support Platform, register on it, or subscribe to the services of the Platform by filling out the form.
dataCollectionText2: We may also collect information about individuals whenever they interact with the Platform. we may use the information we collect from users as appropriate, such as their name, contact information such as email and/or phone number, name of their employer, and website usage data.
howWeUseTheDataCollected: How we use the data collected
howWeUseTheDataCollectedText1: Collecting data in the Government Support Platform on the Sharjah Government Media Bureau website helps us better understand how users use it and what they expect from us. This enables us to ensure that information is available in a timely manner. The Platform may collect and use personal data about users of the Platform for the purposes of:
howWeUseTheDataCollectedPoint2: The ability to communicate with the user to answer any questions and provide the required government support services.
howWeUseTheDataCollectedPoint3: Sending an email to the user to activate the account for each government agency in the Emirate of Sharjah, and for discussions and confirmation of services.
howWeUseTheDataCollectedPoint4: To support, communicate and provide services as quickly as possible.
websiteBrowsingPopUpsText1: Pop-ups allow the website and its associated applications to store your preferences in order to display content, choices or functions tailored to you. It also allows us to see information such as how many people use the site and which pages they prefer to visit.
websiteBrowsingPopUpsText2: Our website may contain pop-ups that enhance user experience. The user's Internet browsing places pop-up windows on the user's computer's hard drive, for the purposes of tracking records and data. While browsing the Internet, the user may choose to refuse to store pop-up windows, or be alerted immediately after they are sent, in which case the website may not work properly.
websiteBrowsingPopUpsText3: Through your web browsing choices, you can determine how our site uses pop-up windows. If you do not want our site to store pop-up windows on your computer or device, you should choose to reject pop-up windows through your web browser.
thirdPartyWebsitesText1: Our website may contain links to other websites.
thirdPartyWebsitesText2: Please note that we do not control other websites outside the scope of the Sharjah Government Media Bureau website, and we are not responsible for the protection and privacy of any information you may share on a website linked to our website. You must be careful when share any data with websites, and you must carefully read the site's security and privacy policies.
userAcceptanceOfThisPolicyText1: Use of this site constitutes your acceptance of the above-mentioned privacy policy. Please do not use this site if you do not accept its privacy policy.
